title: WWII Font
content:
Hello, Can anyone tell me what this font is, or is close to. It is a WWII font used by the Army. Any help would be much appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150223075813im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CRAT_3522.jpg)
author: dsmith05

comments.content:
FF Oxide and United will get you really close.

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff\_oxide\_pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150223075813/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_oxide_pro/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff\_oxide\_pro/")  
 [http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=531&subpage=un\_fonts\_...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150223075813/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=531&subpage=un_fonts_sans "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=531&subpage=un\_fonts\_sans")
